response.overview: In 1164AD heresy against God has spread to the north of England. Many innocent souls have been burnt at the stake for their beliefs. To avoid this fate, some flee to the wild, one hunter must now face confront his issues with faith and the evil's found in the wilderness.
response.tagline: IN THE WILD GOD IS ABSENT AND EVIL IS RIFE
response.title: DELIVER US FROM EVIL
